ðŸ“– Summary: Discordo is a lightweight and feature-rich Discord terminal client designed for users who prefer a text-based interface. It supports essential Discord features like attachments, notifications, and markdown, along with security features like 2-Factor authentication. Discordo is cross-platform, offering prebuilt binaries and package manager support for easy installation on various operating systems.
